title: iMac Display Screen
message:
Sorry to post on this category not sure where to post

I tried a brand new screen and it works fine. Its also not the cable.

Is there a way to fix this problem? iMac A1418 LATE 2013

title: iMac Display Screen
message:
Same with known good display?
Check image on external monitor too.

title: iMac Display Screen
message:
Sorry.

With a known good display it works perfectly. Also there is image on external display. 

I would like to know if is there possible solution to this BAD display? I tried another display LVDS (I guess this is the correct name for the flex which connects monitor and motherboard) cable same issue happen.

title: iMac Display Screen
message:
You've already detected LCD as BAD (expected).
Don't waste time, change it.

BTW, LVDS is the old standard.
Apple use display port (DP) last 10 years.
